entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Drizzle, 1.3°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 19 km

entry.title: Friday: Periods of drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle ending this morning then cloudy. A few flurries beginning this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 3. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 12 May 2023
